prompt: As dawn breaks over the horizon, a breathtaking seascape emerges where the vast ocean meets an untouched shoreline. The scene is captured from a high vantage point on a rocky cliff, offering a sweeping, panoramic view of the expansive ocean below. Rolling waves crash dramatically against the jagged rocks, sending up plumes of white spray that catch the first light of the sun, which paints the sky in vibrant shades of pink and orange. In the foreground, clusters of hardy, salt-tolerant plants cling to the craggy surfaces of the cliff, their vibrant greens contrasting with the more muted tones of the rocks. The midground is dominated by the rhythmic undulation of the waves, their surfaces a shimmering tapestry of blues and greens, while the distant horizon is a soft, blurred line where the ocean meets the sky. Thin wisps of morning fog hover over the water, adding an ethereal quality to the scene. The lighting is soft and diffuse, typical of early morning, creating gentle shadows that enhance the texture of the rocks and plants. The overall color palette is a harmonious blend of cool ocean blues and warm sunrise hues, fostering a mood of tranquil beauty and awe at nature's majestic power. A digital single-lens reflex camera captures the scene with intense clarity, resulting in an image that is crisp and detailed, highlighting the intricate patterns of the water and the subtle nuances of light and color. The photograph exudes a sense of calm yet dynamic energy, characteristic of seascape photography at its finest, blending the raw beauty of nature with technical mastery to create a scene that is both soothing and inspiring in its depiction of the ocean's timeless dance with the land.

description: The scene shows an expansive ocean meeting an untouched shoreline.
Rolling waves crash dramatically against jagged rocks.
Clusters of hardy, salt-tolerant plants cling to rocky surfaces.
questions: Is the scene set by the ocean?
Do the waves crash against rocks?
Are there plants visible on the rocks?
